Aeryn::Henney::function_ptr

Aeryn::Henney::function_ptr Class Reference

A generic function pointer that will take functions of any return type and up to one argument of any type. More...

Detailed Description

A generic function pointer that will take functions of any return type and up to one argument of any type.

Author:
Kevlin Henney & Paul Grenyer
See also:
unary_adaptor

nullary_adaptor
